title: I accidentaly switched server, now this shows up. Don't know what to do
body: I accidentally switched to the Turkish server and I keep getting this, don't know what to do. It always keeps patching whenever I start it up, it starts updating 18mb and this shows up, and then it's always on repeat

replies.body: Anytime you switch servers the client will need to download the language assets for that server. Let that update finish, then you'll be able to switch the region back over to EUNE.
